name: Florida to New York Vacation Travel - Hidden Object Spot and Find Objects Differences Photo Game
name_original: Florida to New York Vacation Travel - Hidden Object Spot and Find Objects Differences Photo Game
description:
Hidden Objects – Florida to New York Vacation is a beautifully designed search and finder game with 30+ “Sunshine” and “Big Apple” themed levels and fun items.

Explore and find plenty of Florida beach landmarks, flamingos and alligators, and New York treasures like yellow cabs, Yankees gear and NYPD’s finest.

Take a Florida tour visiting Miami Beach, Orlando, Ernest Hemingway’s House in Key West, Lego Land, Swamp Lands, and more finding hidden objects! Then, continue your Vacation to New York touring through
Manhattan, Brooklyn, Grand Central Terminal, Central Park and Times Square.

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

Enjoy your Vacation!

Hidden Objects – Florida to New York Vacation features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics with Florida & New York Themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Explore the Sunshine & Empire States

Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
